item.title: Thousand Ant
item.description:
Table of Contents

  • Thousand Ant
    • Flocking With the C# Job System

I work with Thousand Ant and create educational videos/technical scripts to explain new tech and features for their end users.

Thousand Ant

At Thousand Ant, I had the opportunity to create technical demos demoing some techniques game developers can use in their games with Unity.
